page.title: 16Rose And Portcullis Inn
page.content: The tenant obtains his spirits from {Sir Connan Speed Wine Shippers.}The tenant lives above the Pub; he still abides to the 16 century set rules with a few minor up-dates.Children are allowed in if they eat with their parents.The Pub organises Sport for its regular members {e.g.A succesful {Rugby team,Soccer team,Cricket team {Mens and Womens Skittling teams and a {Ballooning crew.}The Pub is visited by travellers just passing along the scenic route.The drinks are ordered by the pub to the companies that supply it by means of a weekly{telephone {order system.}These are ordered on Thursday and delivered Monday.Their most popular season is{Christmas for {meals,}and{Summer for drinking. }The average age of people that drink is 25-30.
